artist: Artist: Caspar Williams; Printer: Harington Fine Arts, Brighton, U.K.; Publisher: Sensitive Comics
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, photomechanical illustrations of various figures in separate comic panels with designs and text printed in cyan and black-and-white offset lithography on coated paper covers; 24 pp.
medium: Cyan and black-and-white offset lithography, letterpress; bound volume
title: Nervous Tales, no. 2
